verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3124><s%> came unto Jonah שֵׁנִ֥ית <S%H8145><s%> the second לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> time saying

ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> unto Nineveh הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> that great וִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and preach אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּרִיאָ֔ה <S%H7150><s%> unto it the preaching אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I דֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that I bid אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose יוֹנָ֗ה <S%H3124><s%> So Jonah וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נִֽינְוֶ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> unto Nineveh כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְנִֽינְוֵ֗ה <S%H5210><s%> Now Nineveh הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> city גְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> great לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> was an exceeding מַהֲלַ֖ךְ <S%H4109><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> of three יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days'

וַיָּ֤חֶל <S%H2490><s%> began יוֹנָה֙ <S%H3124><s%> And Jonah לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to enter בָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city מַהֲלַ֖ךְ <S%H4109><s%> journey י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day's אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> a וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and he cried וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said ע֚וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> Yet forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְנִֽינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> and Nineveh נֶהְפָּֽכֶת׃ <S%H2015><s%> shall be overthrown

וַֽיַּאֲמִ֛ינוּ <S%H539><s%> believed אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the people נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> of Nineveh בֵּֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaimed צוֹם֙ <S%H6685><s%> a fast וַיִּלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H3847><s%> and put שַׂקִּ֔ים <S%H8242><s%> on sackcloth מִגְּדוֹלָ֖ם <S%H1419><s%> from the greatest וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְטַנָּֽם׃ <S%H6996><s%> of them even to the least

וַיִּגַּ֤ע <S%H5060><s%> came הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> For word אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֶ֣לֶך <S%H4428><s%> unto the king נִֽינְוֵ֔ה <S%H5210><s%> of Nineveh וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> and he arose מִכִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> from his throne וַיַּעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and he laid אַדַּרְתּ֖וֹ <S%H155><s%> his robe מֵֽעָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַיְכַ֣ס <S%H3680><s%> from him and covered שַׂ֔ק <S%H8242><s%> [him] with sackcloth וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> in ashes

וַיַּזְעֵ֗ק <S%H2199><s%> And he caused [it] to be proclaimed וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and published בְּנִֽינְוֵ֔ה <S%H5210><s%> through Nineveh מִטַּ֧עַם <S%H2940><s%> by the decree הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וּגְדֹלָ֖יו <S%H1419><s%> and his nobles לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָאָדָ֨ם <S%H120><s%> Let neither man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <S%H929><s%> nor beast הַבָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> herd וְהַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> nor flock אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִטְעֲמוּ֙ <S%H2938><s%> taste מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> any thing אַ֨ל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִרְע֔וּ <S%H7462><s%> let them not feed וּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> nor drink

וְיִתְכַּסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> be covered שַׂקִּ֗ים <S%H8242><s%> with sackcloth הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> But let man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and beast וְיִקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> unto God בְּחָזְקָ֑ה <S%H2394><s%> mightily וְיָשֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> yea let them turn אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from הֶחָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> and from the violence אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּכַפֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3709><s%> that [is] in their hands

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> Who can tell יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> will turn וְנִחַ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> and repent הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [if] God וְשָׁ֛ב <S%H7725><s%> and turn away מֵחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> from his fierce אַפּ֖וֹ <S%H639><s%> anger וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נֹאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> that we perish

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַ֣עֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <S%H4639><s%> their works כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> that they turned מִדַּרְכָּ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> from their evil וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> repented הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> and God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הָרָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> of the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that he had said לַעֲשׂוֹת־ <S%H6213><s%> that he would do לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto them and he did
